title: ATTENDENCE !
content: Is it okay if my attendence is above 80% and not above 85% ? One of our teachers told us that our esa hall ticket wont be generated if our attendence is below 85%....(asking as a sem1 student)

comments.body: They're bluffing. You gotta hold your own
Above 80% should be fine. Below that and you may have issues.
Anything above 70 with club work is fine
Above 80% is fine confirmed with my faculty advisor
